title: Write backwards compatibility tests
description:
Add tests verifying backwards compatibility with Manual field

Test categories:

1. Helper method tests:
   - IsAwaitingHuman() with Manual=true, Awaiting=nil → true
   - IsAwaitingHuman() with Manual=false, Awaiting="work" → true
   - IsAwaitingHuman() with Manual=true, Awaiting="approval" → true (awaiting wins)
   - GetAwaitingType() with Manual=true → "work"
   - GetAwaitingType() with Awaiting="approval" → "approval"

2. Query tests:
   - Ready() excludes Manual=true ticks
   - tk list --awaiting includes Manual=true ticks
   - tk next --awaiting returns Manual=true ticks

3. Migration tests:
   - Setting awaiting clears manual
   - --manual flag sets awaiting, not manual
   - Deprecation warning printed

4. Round-trip tests:
   - Load Manual=true tick, update other field, save → Manual preserved
   - Load Manual=true tick, set awaiting, save → Manual cleared
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Helper method tests cover Manual backwards compat
- [ ] Query tests verify Manual ticks included/excluded correctly
- [ ] Migration tests verify clean transition
- [ ] Round-trip tests verify no data corruption
- [ ] All tests pass
